content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSVAL
      operator: non_empty
    - name: TSVALNF
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000150
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when TSVAL is populated and TSVALNF is also populated.
Outcome:
  Message: TSVALNF is not null when TSVAL is populated
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0260
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Null flavor for the value of TSPARM, to be populated
                  if and only if TSVAL is null.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: Trigger error when TSVAL is populated and TSVALNF is also populated.

Outcome.Message: TSVALNF is not null when TSVAL is populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Null flavor for the value of TSPARM, to be populated if and only if TSVAL is null.
